translations.translation: He truly was one of Our slaves who are muminun.
Surely he was among Our faithful creatures.
Surely he was one of Our truly believing servants.
He was one of Our believing servants.
He is indeed one of Our high ranking, firmly believing bondmen.
Verily, he [Nuh] was one of Our believing servants.
Surely he was of Our believing servants.
he was among Our believing servants.
Lo! he is one of Our believing slaves.
he was truly one of Our faithful servants.
Verily he was of Our bondmen believing.
He is indeed one of Our faithful servants.
For he was one of our believing Servants.
Verily, he [Nuh (Noah)] was one of Our believing slaves.
he was one of Our believing worshipers.
He was one of Our believing servants.
Indeed, he was of Our believing servants.
[37:81] He was indeed one of Our faithful servants.
(Lo! he is one of Our believing slaves.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: وكيف لا نبقي له ذكراً جميلاً ولا نجزيه جزاء جزيلاً؟! { إِنَّهُ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ } [الصافات: 81] الموقنين بتوحيدنا، المتوكلين علينا، المفوضين أمورهم إلينا، المخلصين فيما جاءوا به من الأعمال والأفعال
